forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 67, with temperatures falling to around 65 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 6 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind 8 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the day unfolds under a canopy of sunshine, a rarity that invites a sense of possibility. The high will hover around a mild 67 degrees, drifting downwards towards 65 as the afternoon unfolds, while gentle winds from the southwest maintain a light, refreshing presence. The landscape appears vibrant against the backdrop of blue skies, unmarred by fog or the usual marine layer, hinting at a day blessed with clarity. As the sun sets, the skies will break into a whisper of partly cloudy hues, settling into a comfortably mild evening with temperatures dipping to about 56.

In this welcoming weather, one might choose to take a stroll along the Embarcadero, soaking in views of the Bay, or enjoy a leisurely outdoor café experience, perhaps indulging in a warm coffee or tea as the sun begins its descent. Layers are wise today, embracing the warmth of the day while preparing for the cooler evening breeze. A light jacket or sweater will perfectly complement the mild temperatures. While some may rush to the popular tourist spots, consider the quiet charm of Benicia or a visit to a local bookstore, where the gentle lull of an afternoon breeze makes even the most mundane activities feel somewhat profound.
